tool.name: Stanford NER (Jetstream)
tool.help:
**What it does**
Generates named entity annotations (Person, Organization, Location) using the `Stanford Named Entity Recognizer <https://nlp.stanford.edu/software/CRF-NER.shtml>`_
**Required annotations**
* `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token.html>`_ with `Penn part of speech tags <https://www.ling.upenn.edu/courses/Fall_2003/ling001/penn_treebank_pos.html>`_ (LIF) * `Sentence <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Sentence.html>`_ (LIF)
**Generated Annotations**
A LIF document with a new view containing `NamedEntity <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/NamedEntity.html>`_ annotations, with the type (e.g., Person, Location) as the value of the *category* feature.
**License**
Stanford CoreNLP is licensed under `the GNU General Public License <https://stanfordnlp.github.io/CoreNLP/#license>`_.
